title: Tax on positive exernality ups deadweight loss

content.question: In a perfectly competitive market for a good with a downward sloping demand curve and an upward sloping supply curve, the marginal social benefit is greater than the marginal social cost at the market equilibrium quantity. The government imposition of a new per-unit tax on the production of the good would

choices.label: have no effect on the price of the good
increase the quantity sold of the good
